events.message: Applicant submitted a personal loan application to cover medical expenses and consolidate existing debt.
The loan application was categorised under 'Personal Loan' based on the stated purpose involving medical bills.
A loan officer specializing in personal loans was assigned to facilitate and support the applicant throughout the process.
Initial review completed to verify applicant details and assess loan purpose validity primarily for medical and personal debt.
Applicant was asked to provide income statements, medical invoices, and previous loan repayment records for further evaluation.
All requested documents were submitted by the applicant, including detailed medical bills and salary slips for credit validation.
Credit background check was completed showing a stable repayment history with moderate outstanding debt.
Risk assessment evaluated the applicant’s financial exposure and capacity to repay the loan considering current debts.
A loan offer was presented with favorable interest rates and repayment terms customized to cover medical and personal expenses.
Applicant provided positive feedback on the offer, requesting minor adjustments in repayment scheduling for convenience.
Application was escalated to senior underwriting due to requested repayment schedule modifications and higher loan amount.
After senior review, the loan was approved with adjusted terms accommodating applicant’s repayment preferences.
Funds were successfully disbursed to the applicant’s account to cover medical bills and consolidate existing personal debts.
Follow-up call was made to confirm satisfaction with loan servicing and to provide assistance with upcoming repayments.
The loan application case was formally closed after confirming all documentation and disbursement were completed successfully.
